channel.title: Comments on: Ask, But Don’t Tell

item.title: By: itdoesntmatterbut
item.dc:creator: itdoesntmatterbut
item.description:
Even tho I am not the one you are asking.. With no due respect what so ever, mr griefer, you'r such a reet I am speechless.
"Let me ask you: how's your kids college fund coming?" I don't got any kids, but believe you me, when the day comes there wont be an issue about providing or not
"Is your wife happy with you sitting at the 21st century boob tube for 20 hours at a time?" I don't got a wife at the time of being, but I have a habit of finding female aquintances with the same interests as me.. thats right.. boob tube.
"What have you done to improve yourself lately? (and no, the purple legendary weapon you looted doesn't count)" I work out every day, earn quite a lot more money than other people my age, doing a job I love doing, and am good at doing it. Oh, even tho it doesn't count, I also got loads of purple epixx, but no purple legendary weapons(?). And I think it does count, since imho. life is about having fun, I have a great irl life and have fun raiding with both irl and wow-friends. And you know, some of the encounters can be quite challenging, so of all the things I have done to improve myself lately, I am by far most happy with the raiding accomplishments.
I feel kinda moronic answering these stupid questions, but your narrow minded head deserves answers..
item.content:encoded:
Even tho I am not the one you are asking..
With no due respect what so ever, mr griefer, you’r such a reet I am speechless.

“Let me ask you: how’s your kids college fund coming?”
I don’t got any kids, but believe you me, when the day comes
there wont be an issue about providing or not

“Is your wife happy with you sitting at the 21st century boob tube for 20 hours at a time?”
I don’t got a wife at the time of being, but I have a habit of finding female aquintances
with the same interests as me.. thats right.. boob tube.

“What have you done to improve yourself lately? (and no, the purple legendary weapon you looted doesn’t count)”
I work out every day, earn quite a lot more money than other people my age, doing a job I love doing, and am good at doing it. Oh, even tho it doesn’t count, I also got loads of purple epixx, but no purple legendary weapons(?). And I think it does count, since imho. life is about having fun, I have a great irl life and have fun raiding with both irl and wow-friends. And you know, some of the encounters can be quite challenging, so of all the things I have done to improve myself lately, I am by far most happy with the raiding accomplishments.

I feel kinda moronic answering these stupid questions, but your narrow minded head
deserves answers..

item.title: By: jeff freeman
item.dc:creator: jeff freeman
item.description:
whatdoesitmatter spake:
How far are you prepared to take that moniker?
item.content:encoded:
whatdoesitmatter spake:

How far are you prepared to take that moniker?

item.title: By: whatdoesitmatter?
item.dc:creator: whatdoesitmatter?
item.description:
Jeeze, was high school so bad for you that you have to go to these lengths to re-engineer the experience with you on top?
drooling morons, eh? Because they can't kill an imaginary foozits in some 'escape from reality' waste of time?
Let me ask you... how's your kids college fund coming? Is your wife happy with you sitting at the 21st century boob tube for 20 hours at a time?
If none of these apply, then... what have you done to improve yourself lately? (and no, the purple legendary weapon you looted doesn't count)
item.content:encoded:
Jeeze, was high school so bad for you that you have to go to these lengths to re-engineer the experience with you on top?

drooling morons, eh? Because they can’t kill an imaginary foozits in some ‘escape from reality’ waste of time?

Let me ask you… how’s your kids college fund coming? Is your wife happy with you sitting at the 21st century boob tube for 20 hours at a time?

If none of these apply, then… what have you done to improve yourself lately? (and no, the purple legendary weapon you looted doesn’t count)

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Wow Chef - a fellow unguilded high level player (holy shit!)
I can also vouch for this "popular unguilded dood" phenomenon - as long as you're not a total jackass/douchebag, the /tells come fast and furious. Where are their guildmates, and why aren't they helping them with their instance runs?
And no kidding about the dramaqueen bullshit - any surprise that some of us want nothing to do with guilds? Though if you're serious about the evil guild, call it "The Pariahs" or something like that. It'd be wonderful to see how large of an implosion such a guild would be (make sure they post to multiple gaming message boards for maximum drama). :)
item.content:encoded:
Wow Chef – a fellow unguilded high level player (holy shit!)

I can also vouch for this “popular unguilded dood” phenomenon – as long as you’re not a total jackass/douchebag, the /tells come fast and furious. Where are their guildmates, and why aren’t they helping them with their instance runs?

And no kidding about the dramaqueen bullshit – any surprise that some of us want nothing to do with guilds? Though if you’re serious about the evil guild, call it “The Pariahs” or something like that. It’d be wonderful to see how large of an implosion such a guild would be (make sure they post to multiple gaming message boards for maximum drama). ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
<blockquote>I have been flirting with the thought of creating a guild of outcasts, jerks, griefers, ninja looters, trollers and flamers - providing no leadership and see what happens.</blockquote>
Sounds like something from <em>Papillon</em>.
item.content:encoded:
I have been flirting with the thought of creating a guild of outcasts, jerks, griefers, ninja looters, trollers and flamers – providing no leadership and see what happens.

Sounds like something from Papillon.

item.title: By: Chef
item.dc:creator: Chef
item.description:
This is part of the reason why I cannot stand guilds. They act like bitchy women at the slightest infraction. I must admit that it's fun to make fun of the MMO nerds in IF while camping auctions. Tell a lvl 60 uberguild priest that he wasted his money on an epic mount and watch the sparks fly. They are so easy to flame that it's amazing.
The whole blacklisting thing is silly. I act like a total jerk sometimes and still get 3+ guild invites a day. In fact, being the only unguilded lvl 56 character on the server makes you quite annoyingly popular.
I have been flirting with the thought of creating a guild of outcasts, jerks, griefers, ninja looters, trollers and flamers - providing no leadership and see what happens. At this point, being banned would be more exciting than Blizzard's end game content.
item.content:encoded:
This is part of the reason why I cannot stand guilds. They act like bitchy women at the slightest infraction. I must admit that it’s fun to make fun of the MMO nerds in IF while camping auctions. Tell a lvl 60 uberguild priest that he wasted his money on an epic mount and watch the sparks fly. They are so easy to flame that it’s amazing.

The whole blacklisting thing is silly. I act like a total jerk sometimes and still get 3+ guild invites a day. In fact, being the only unguilded lvl 56 character on the server makes you quite annoyingly popular.

I have been flirting with the thought of creating a guild of outcasts, jerks, griefers, ninja looters, trollers and flamers – providing no leadership and see what happens. At this point, being banned would be more exciting than Blizzard’s end game content.

item.title: By: Sagey
item.dc:creator: Sagey
item.description:
Greenmarine of SWG-dev fame? Fix smugglers already ;P
On topic: I quit WoW for the very reason that our server is entirely filled with those kinds of people.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: GreenMarine
item.dc:creator: GreenMarine
item.description: I wish they'd fix Azuregos so that the graveyard zerg tactic didn't work. Azuregos was supposed to be a tough fight right? Trivilized by being able to throw infinite fodder at her until she goes down.
item.content:encoded: I wish they’d fix Azuregos so that the graveyard zerg tactic didn’t work. Azuregos was supposed to be a tough fight right? Trivilized by being able to throw infinite fodder at her until she goes down.

item.title: By: Aufero
item.dc:creator: Aufero
item.description:
A few months in VT taught most EQ guilds (The ones who hadn't learned earlier from Velious, that is) to spy, lie, KS and train - or at least, to expect other people to.
Ain't human nature wonderful?
item.content:encoded:
A few months in VT taught most EQ guilds (The ones who hadn’t learned earlier from Velious, that is) to spy, lie, KS and train – or at least, to expect other people to.

Ain’t human nature wonderful?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Ya, they got the W on the dragon ... wasn't pretty, but a W nonetheless. Don't remember what it dropped, was a handful of rare+ items. Although, dropped loot is another thing players lie about. ;) Not judging! I lie about dropped loot too when I'm hoping to throw someone off the scent.
item.content:encoded: Ya, they got the W on the dragon … wasn’t pretty, but a W nonetheless. Don’t remember what it dropped, was a handful of rare+ items. Although, dropped loot is another thing players lie about. ðŸ˜‰ Not judging! I lie about dropped loot too when I’m hoping to throw someone off the scent.
